trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air or water.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.
